org.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM diary_comments INNER JOIN users ON users.id = diary_comments.user_id WHERE diary_comments.diary_entry_id = "$1" AND diary_comments.visible = "$2" AND users.status IN ("$3", "$4")

rewrites.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM diary_comments WHERE diary_comments.diary_entry_id = "$1" AND diary_comments.visible = "$2"
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM diary_comments WHERE diary_comments.diary_entry_id = "$1" AND diary_comments.visible = "$2" LIMIT 1

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM diary_comments INNER JOIN users ON users.id = diary_comments.user_id WHERE diary_comments.diary_entry_id = "$1" AND diary_comments.visible = "$2" AND users.status IN ("$3", "$4") LIMIT 1
